   contain the root `toctree` directive.

=========================
Opensearch documentation!
=========================

Here you will find documentation regarding various aspects of the Opensearch 
project. It is a work in progress so please let the development team know if 
new or better documentations is needed. Send a email to opensearch.head@gmail.com 
in this regard.

.. toctree::
   :maxdepth: 2

   DBCs Python Project <dbc_python/dbc_python_intro>

.. Indices and tables
   ==================

   * :ref:`genindex`
   * :ref:`modindex`
   * :ref:`search`


===================================
Introduction to DBCs Python Project
===================================

At DBC we a striving to collect all reusable Python code developed at DBC in one 
common project. A description of this project including relevant links can be found 
here: :doc:`dbc_python/dbc_python_intro`.
